messages.subject: Re: Short film may be of interest
messages.msgSnippet: Way cool, as my son would say. I find it intriguing that there are so many people hardly anybody knows anything about who are so much smarter than Dr. Phil. :)
messages.messageBody:
Way cool, as my son would say. I find it intriguing that there are so
many people hardly anybody knows anything about who are so much
smarter than Dr. Phil. :)

Bob


--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, "Joanne O'N."

points ...mostly about how we

how trading in our false
> sense of "knowing" for curiosity can lead to a much fuller life...I
appreciated it and thought I'd
> pass the link along.
>
> Joanne O'N.

> I don't know anything about Nicole Mackenzie, but I thought the
little film (9 minutes) was
> thought provoking.
> http://www.monday9am.tv/fotw/intro

messages.subject: Short film may be of interest
messages.msgSnippet: This was posted on another list that I m on. It made several points ...mostly about how we have to change the way we think in order to change our lives, and
messages.messageBody:
This was posted on another list that I'm on. It made several points ...mostly about how we
have to change the way we think in order to change our lives, and how trading in our false
sense of "knowing" for curiosity can lead to a much fuller life...I appreciated it and thought I'd
pass the link along.

Joanne O'N.

I don't know anything about Nicole Mackenzie, but I thought the little film (9 minutes) was
thought provoking.
http://www.monday9am.tv/fotw/intro
